about_the_game:
VolleyBrawl is a futuristic Volleyball style game played by robotic competitors. Play in the steel arena with a variety of different robots combining tactics, skill, teamwork and aggression to win the match. Work solo with your AI team or with some friends as you combine a variety of tactics to ultimately dominate the game. Pass to a teammate to create the perfect assault, protect your side with your magnetic field, or use your unique special to throw the enemy off their game. Are your bolts big enough to be the champion of this electrified arena?

· Not all robots are manufactured equally
6 unique robot classes with their own special abilities

· Enter the arena solo or with your buddies
Play by yourself, with your friends up to 6 players, or enjoy online multiplayer

· Special Abilities
Need to score? Can’t seem to get a lead on a particular nasty opponent? Use your robot’s special ability to turn the tide for your team

· Knock Out System
Why try to out maneuver your opponent when you can just knock them out? Take advantage of your pinned down opponents and make the best to get a score

· Tracked Data
Compete to see who scored the most points, did the most KOs, and who is the real MVP with cold hard calculated data

· Full Controller Support
Not only does VolleyBrawl fully support up to 6 controllers but they work together with keyboard and mouse. Tested with Steam controllers, Xbox controllers, PlayStation controllers, Switch Pro controllers, and generic LG controllers -> technically it should work with any other controller.

VolleyBrawl is a futuristic Volleyball style game played by robotic competitors. Play in the steel arena with a variety of different robots combining tactics, skill, teamwork and aggression to win the match. Work solo with your AI team or with some friends as you combine a variety of tactics to ultimately dominate the game. Pass to a teammate to create the perfect assault, protect your side with your magnetic field, or use your unique special to throw the enemy off their game. Are your bolts big enough to be the champion of this electrified arena?

legal_notice: Do not extract or reproduce music from this game.
name: VolleyBrawl

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 SP1+
  • Processor: 2.4 Ghz or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX10, DX11, DX12 capable GPUs.
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 150 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Whatever you have
  • Additional Notes: May need to tweak graphics settings to reach a constant 60 fps
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 4.20 Ghz 4 Cores or Higher
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1080
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 150 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Whatever you have
  • Additional Notes: Should run smooth at max settings close to 100 fps.

short_description: Volleyball with a robotic twist! Play up to 6 unique robots with their own stats and special abilities as you take on your opponents in 3 vs 3 Volleyball combat. Volley, set, pass and knockout your opponents as you combine a variety of fast paced tactics to win your matches in the arena.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese - Portugal, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Turkish, Ukrainian
